title: 820-00244 missing PP5V_S4
message:
Liquid damaged usb-c and audio boards/cable.

Usb-C board doesnt look bad afaik its just corrosion on the contacts which i have cleared up.
Measured rails and PP5V_S4 is missing with a 19ohm short? to gnd

Also how does the disconnect battery button work?

Usb-c board on the way, cant find replacement audio board so testing without it atm

title: 820-00244 missing PP5V_S4
message: 19 Ohm to GND on 5V is of course way too low. Inject voltage and see if anything heats up.

title: 820-00244 missing PP5V_S4
message:
My bad, was measuring while battery was still connected resistance now 20k+
Traced back and u7650 is not getting EN (PM_SLP_S5_L) now a bit confused as it seems this comes from the cpu but it needs s0 rails to power up?

PPBUS_G3H     8.67v
PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING_ISNS      8.68v
PPVBUS_LIO      14.8v
PP3V3_G3H     3.3v
PP3V3R3V0_AON     3.279v
PPVRTC_G3H    3.073v
PP5V_G3H    4.99v
PP5V_S5        4.99v
PP5V_S4        0v
PP3V3_S5    3.33v
PM_SLP_S5_L 0v

title: 820-00244 missing PP5V_S4
message: Yeah, this is gonna suck. All I can say is to inspect the board for corrosion. Charging circuit seems to work as you have 15V on the input so it is talking to the charger.

title: 820-00244 missing PP5V_S4
message: the only corrosion on the board was a tiny bit near Q7291, will try ultrasonic and see what happens

title: 820-00244 missing PP5V_S4
message: Inspect very closely before cleaning, crucial evidence will be lost!

title: 820-00244 missing PP5V_S4
message:
I have taken pictures of both sides, Well after ultrasonic it now boots.
It was running off of battery after cleaning, because I dont have a usb-c hub i let it charge up to 50% so it would let me install osx.
Now in osx, its saying 64% "Replace Now" and wont run off of the battery at all nor charge the battery, now when the machine is off and I plug in charger it comes up with the battery screen with 0% but before it was displaying fine but once booted in osx it will say 64%

title: 820-00244 missing PP5V_S4
message: but it was working for a bit and stats all come up in the about this mac section, WIll check current resistors when i get back tomorrow. Any other ideas?

title: 820-00244 missing PP5V_S4
message: well that sucks cant find any replacements

title: 820-00244 missing PP5V_S4
message: Went to test it today, and the battery is working fine, 95% health this is weird
